#summary A listing of extensions provided by users, but not currently part of the client's distribution
#labels Featured

This is a listing of user submitted patches that are not currently integrated into the Solr PHP Client's codebase, but may be of interest to other users.

PLEASE NOTE: some of these patches may no longer cleanly apply to current trunk, and may require changes to function as intended.

= Batchable Service =
A subclass of the Apache_Solr_Service that lets you defer commits. Attached to [http://code.google.com/p/solr-php-client/issues/detail?id=54#c2 issue #54]

= Highlighting API =
A set of patches that attempt to make it simpler to use the Solr Highlighting features. Attached to [http://code.google.com/p/solr-php-client/issues/detail?id=44 issue #44]

= Spell Check API =
A set of patches that attempt to make it simpler to use the Solr spell check handler. Attached to [http://code.google.com/p/solr-php-client/issues/detail?id=41 issue #41]

= TermsComponent API = 
A set of patches that attempt to make it simpler to use the Terms request handler. Attached to [http://code.google.com/p/solr-php-client/issues/detail?id=32 issue #32]
